directions: Bring water in the bottom a double boiler to a simmer: hot water in double boiler base should not touch pan above. In the top of the double boiler, slightly beat egg yolks. Slowly whisk in butter, and then gradually whisk in water. Cook, stirring, until thickened. Remove double boiler top from base.
Gradually whisk in lemon juice, and season with salt and cayenne. Cover, and keep hot over warm water until serving.
ingredients: ¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
title: Southern Hollandaise Sauce
